TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SoapAttributeOverrides extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许您在使用 将对象序列化或反序列化为编码的 SOAP 时重写应用于属性、字段和类的特性。

span.span: Allows you to override attributes applied to properties, fields, and classes when you use an to serialize or deserialize an object as encoded SOAP.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类使 可以重写序列化一组对象的默认方式。The class enables an to override the default way of serializing a set of objects. 以这种方式重写序列化具有两个用途：首先，可以控制和增加 DLL 中找到的对象的序列化，即使您不具有对源的访问权限也是如此。其次，您可以创建一组可序列化类，但可以通过多种方式序列化这些对象。Overriding serialization in this way has two uses: first, you can control and augment the serialization of objects found in a DLL, even if you do not have access to the source; second, you can create one set of serializable classes, but serialize the objects in multiple ways. 例如，可以将类实例的成员作为 xml 属性进行序列化，而不是将其序列化为 xml 元素，从而使传输的文档更有效。For example, instead of serializing members of a class instance as XML elements, you can serialize them as XML attributes, resulting in a more efficient document to transport. 创建后 ，可以 使用 类的方法创建 。After you create a , you create an using the method of the class. 将生成的对象作为参数传递到 构造函数。Pass the resulting object as an argument to the constructor. 生成的 使用所包含的数据 来重写属性，这些属性可控制对象的序列化方式。The resulting uses the data contained by the to override attributes that control how objects are serialized. 若要实现此目的， 包含被重写的对象类型的集合，以及 与每个被重写的对象类型相关联的。To accomplish this, the contains a collection of the object types that are overridden, as well as a associated with each overridden object type. 每个都 包含一组适当的属性对象，这些对象控制如何序列化每个字段、属性或类。Each contains an appropriate set of attribute objects that control how each field, property, or class is serialized. 创建和使用的过程如下所示 ：The process for creating and using a is as follows: 1. 创建 。Create a . 2. 创建适合要重写的对象的属性对象。Create an attribute object that is appropriate to the object being overridden. 例如，若要重写字段或属性，请 使用新的派生类型创建。For example, to override a field or property, create a , using the new, derived type. 您可以选择分配一个新 的，它重写基类的属性名称或命名空间。You can optionally assign a new that overrides the base class's attribute name or namespace. 3. 将特性对象添加到相应的 属性或集合。Add the attribute object to the appropriate property or collection. 例如，你可以将对象的 属性设置 为， 并指定要重写的成员名称。For example, you would set the property of the object to the and specify the member name that is being overridden. 4. 创建 。Create a . 5. 使用方法将添加到 。Add the to the using the method. 如果要重写的对象是 ，则只需要指定重写的对象的类型。If the object being overridden is a , you need only specify the type of the overridden object. 但如果要重写字段或属性，还必须指定重写成员的名称。But if you are overriding a field or property, you must also specify the name of the overridden member. 6. 使用 类的方法创建 。Create an using the method of the class. 7. 构造时 ，将传递 到 构造函数。When constructing the , pass the to the constructor. 8. 使用生成的 序列化或反序列化类对象。Use the resulting to serialize or deserialize the class objects. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含特性对象的联合，这将导致 为一组对象重写其默认序列化行为。The contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 选择要放置在中的特性对象 ，具体取决于要重写的特定行为。You choose the attribute objects to place in the , depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，默认情况下，将 类成员序列化为 XML 元素。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果希望将成员作为 XML 特性序列化，则需要创建 ，并将其分配给的 属性 ，并将添加 到 。If you want the member to be serialized as an XML attribute instead, you would create a , assign it to the property of a , and add the to the . 使用 方法可将添加 到 。Use the method to add the to the . 使用此重载添加一个 包含的 。Use this overload to add a that contains a . 由于将 重写类的序列化，因此无需指定要重写的类的成员，而只需指定类的类型。Because the overrides the serialization of a class, you need not specify a member of the class to override, only the type of the class. ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. [!code-cpp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CPP/soapover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/CS/soapover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SoapAttributesOverrides#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/SoapAttributesOverrides/VB/SoapOver.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含特性对象的联合，这将导致 为一组对象重写其默认序列化行为。The contains a union of attribute objects that cause the to override its default serialization behavior for a set of objects. 选择要放置在中的特性对象 ，具体取决于要重写的特定行为。You choose the attribute objects to place in the , depending on the particular behaviors you want to override. 例如，默认情况下，将 类成员序列化为 XML 元素。For example, the serializes a class member as an XML element by default. 如果希望将成员作为 SOAP 特性序列化，请创建一个 ，将其分配给的 属性 ，并将添加 到 。If you want the member to be serialized as a SOAP attribute instead, you would create a , assign it to the property of a , and add the to the . 使用 方法可将添加 到 。Use the method to add the to the . 当 包含 、 、或时， 请使用此方法。Use this method when the contains either a , , , or . ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类进行序列化 `Group` 。The following example serializes a class named `Group`. `GroupName`重写和字段的序列化 `IgnoreThis` 和枚举的成员 `GroupType` 。The serialization of the `GroupName` and `IgnoreThis` fields and the members of the `GroupType` enumeration are overridden. 在方法中， `CreateOverrideSerializer` 创建一个，对于每个重写的成员或枚举，将 使用适当的属性集创建，并将其添加到中 。In the `CreateOverrideSerializer` method, a is created, and for each overridden member or enumeration, a is created with the appropriate property set and added to the . 是使用创建的 ，并且 用于创建 重写默认序列化的。An is created using the , and that is used to create the that overrides the default serialization. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此重载返回一个， 它包含重写、、 或的属性 。Use this overload to return a that contains attributes that override a , , , or . 你还可以返回 ，其中包含使用的默认值的重写 。You can also return a that contains the override of a default value that uses a . 如果 包含 ，则必须使用仅指定重写类型的重载。If the contains a , you must use the overload that specifies only the overridden type. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 ，用于重写类的实例的序列化 `Group` 。The following example creates a used to override the serialization of an instance of the `Group` class. 该示例还使用 属性来检索 用于指定如何重写序列化的。The example also uses the property to retrieve the that is used to specify how the serialization is being overridden.
